sentence: They're  a  reminder  of  what  happened  on  Oct.  7,  when  Hamas  militants  launched  brutal  surprise  attacks  in  Israel  that  the  government  says  killed  about  1,200  people.

Hamas  fighters  killed  dozens  of  people  and  kidnapped  others,  and  burned  and  destroyed  houses  and  other  buildings  in  Kibbutz  Be'eri,  where  61-year-old  Jelin  has  lived  her  whole  life.

In  the  conflict  that  has  followed  the  Oct.  7  attacks,  the  Israeli  military  has  carried  out  strikes  that  have  killed  more  than  11,200  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  health  officials  in  the  Hamas-controlled  territory,  and  trapped  civilians  with  little  water,  power  and  medical  care.
